item.title: Using dnsmasq with networkManager in Ubuntu
item.description: Intro In pandemic times, remote work increased VPN use in employees that need to consume internal services hosted in companies on-premise environment. Normally, this VPN connection will be use the DNS server of your company in order to resolve all DNS names of your company and outside internet urls.
